decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to assemble the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Urza's Tower, Urza's Power Plant) in order to generate a large amount of mana and play powerful threats like Karn, the Great Creator, Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, and Wurmcoil Engine. The deck also includes a variety of artifacts and color fixing cards to help with ramp and consistency. The inclusion of cards like Oblivion Stone and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon provides additional control and removal options. Overall, the deck aims to control the board while setting up a powerful win condition.

The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and cascade spells, taking advantage of the powerful cascade mechanic to cast multiple spells for free. The key strategy is to consistently cascade into high-impact cards like Crashing Footfalls and Leyline of the Guildpact to put pressure on the opponent and quickly close out the game. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Negation and Leyline Binding to control the game and protect its own game plan. Overall, the deck seeks to win fast and decisively through efficient use of cascade spells and aggressive creatures.

This deck focuses on utilizing The Underworld Cookbook to enable various powerful abilities and synergies with cards such as Ovalchase Daredevil, Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, and Urza's Saga. The goal is to quickly ramp up and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures, graveyard recursion, and land recursion. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and proactive, utilizing a mix of aggressive creatures and powerful artifacts to quickly establish board presence and pressure the opponent.

This deck focuses on casting spells with cascade mechanics to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game while also controlling the board with cards like Force of Negation and Subtlety. The combination of Aggro playstyle and Cascade mechanics creates a fast-paced, aggressive strategy that aims to win the game before the opponent can establish a strong board presence.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Hardened Scales enchantment to maximize the +1/+1 counters placed on creatures. By quickly ramping up the power of creatures like Walking Ballista and Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggro and take them out swiftly. The inclusion of cards like Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings helps to search for crucial pieces of the deck, while cards like Welding Jar and Pithing Needle provide protection and disruption against opposing strategies. Overall, the deck aims to quickly build a formidable board presence and close out the game before the opponent has a chance to respond.

The deck focuses on using a combination of creatures like Generous Ent, Oliphaunt, Architects of Will, Waker of Waves, Curator of Mysteries, and Shardless Agent to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By cycling cards like Force of Negation, Subtlety, and Street Wraith, as well as casting Living End and Violent Outburst, the deck can quickly fill the graveyard with creatures and then bring them all back onto the battlefield for a powerful finish. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a large number of creatures and outvalue them in a quick and explosive manner.

The main concept of this Merfolk aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with creatures that benefit from Lord of Atlantis and Master of the Pearl Trident's abilities, as well as disrupt their strategy with cards like Merfolk Trickster and Tishana's Tidebinder. The deck also focuses on control elements with cards like Force of Negation and Subtlety, while using Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and provide synergy with tribal effects. Mutavault and Cavern of Souls help with mana fixing and protecting against counterspells, making it a versatile and powerful aggressive deck in the Modern format.

The deck revolves around utilizing Underworld Breach in combination with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Grinding Station to set up a powerful combo that allows for looping through the deck and eventually winning the game with Thassa's Oracle. The deck also includes key pieces like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga to generate value and set up the combo efficiently. Teferi, Time Raveler helps protect the combo while Expressive Iteration and Preordain provide consistency. The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo pieces and win the game in a fast and efficient manner.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and high damage spells. The deck utilizes a wide range of colors to have access to different types of removal and threats. With powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Nishoba Brawler, along with efficient spells like Tribal Flames and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to quickly bring the opponent's life total down while controlling the board. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support for the aggressive strategy, making it difficult for the opponent to stabilize and turn the game around.
